description.jp: ライトニングたちの時代から700年後の未来からやってきた「最後の人類」でセラを時空を超えた旅に導いた張本人。カイアスとは浅からぬ縁がある。命の大切さを誰よりも知っており 未来に希望をもたらす確固たる意志を持っている。
description.gl: The last remaining Farseer from seven hundred years after Lightning's time, he is responsible for leading Serah on her journey through time. He has a deep connection with Caius. He understands the value of life more than anyone and fosters an unshakable will to bring hope to the future.

jp.text: 了解 射止めてみせる
約束！ \n生きること 絶対にあきらめるな！
さよならは お預けだ！
あんたに会いたくて\n何度も生まれ変わったんだ！
あんたを倒して 切り拓くんだ！

gl.text: You got it. I'll track her down.
Don't ever lay down and wait to die!
She wanted to see you! Again and again、 without end!
Even if it means destroying you!

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Tempeststrike (C)]
• Cancels all targets' BREAK state before BRV attacks
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Increases Call Effect by 20%
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Tempeststrike (C):
 • Cancels target's Break before BRV  attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slight special effect boost after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「テンペストブロウ【C】」使用時
・BRV攻撃前にターゲットのブレイク状態を解除
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・使用後特殊効果の効果小アップ

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Big Bang (C)]
• If target is broken, cancel's BREAK and inflicts BREAK
• BRV attack hit count becomes 10
　Increases total BRV potency by 90%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Call Effect duration +3
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Big Bang (C):
 • Cancels Break on all enemies afflicted with Break, inflicts Break before BRV  attack
 • BRV  attack hit count becomes 10; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
 • Special effect duration +3 after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ビッグバン【C】」使用時
・BRV攻撃前に対象がブレイク中の場合はブレイクを解除した上でブレイク
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が10HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・使用後特殊効果の3ACTION期間延長

desc.en:
Break all enemies
8-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking ST
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Deals 100% HP damage to all targets
Self: 5 turns [Hunter of Light]; 6 turns 3 levels of [Last Hunter]
Does not consume use count on next turn (excl. some abilities)

While [Hunter of Light] is active
• Increases HP damage dealt by 30% when attacking broken target
• When inflicting BREAK, triggers follow-up attack
　∟ 5-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack

　∟ * Up to 1 additional activation per turn, except for some attacks)
desc.gl:
Inflicts Break on all enemies
8-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals total HP damage to each target
Self: 5 turns Hunter of Light; 6 turns 3 levels of Last Hunter (limit 3)
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)

 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

name.jp: テンペストブロウエクステンド

desc.en:
[Tempeststrike] use +1

When using [Tempeststrike]
• BRV attack becomes AoE
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 120%
• Increases total BRV potency by 100% when inflicting BREAK or attacking broken target
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

When attacking broken target
• [Tempeststrike] becomes [Tempeststrike+]
　∟ Cancels all targets' BREAK state before BRV attacks
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 40%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Tempeststrike use +1

When using Tempeststrike:
 • BRV attack becomes group attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderate BRV damage boost when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

When attacking selected target afflicted with Break:
 • Tempeststrike becomes Tempeststrike+, adds following effects:
 • Cancels target's Break before BRV attack
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%

name.jp: 疾風連槍牙エクステンド

desc.en:
[Gale Fang] use +3

When using [Gale Fang]
• Inflicts BREAK before first BRV attack
• Becomes
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
　∟ + 4-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
• Increases total BRV potency by 80%
• Increases total BRV potency by 120% when inflicting BREAK or attacking broken target
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

When attacking broken target
• [Gale Fang] becomes [Gale Fang+]
　∟ If target is broken, cancel's BREAK and inflicts BREAK
　∟ BRV attack hit count increased by 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 40%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV

While [Last Hunter] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [Fearsiphon]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
　∟ Lowers Action Delay by 8 when breaking target or attacking broken target
　∟ Does not consume use count on next turn when breaking target
• [HP Attack] becomes [Scourge]
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 100%)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Becomes [Scourge+] when attacking broken target
　　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 5
　　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 200%
　　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Gale Fang use +3

When using Gale Fang:
 • Inflicts Break before first BRV attack
 • 4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack becomes 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack + 4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderate BRV damage boost when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When attacking target afflicted with Break:
 • Gale Fang becomes Gale Fang+, adds following effects:
 • Cancels target's Break, inflicts Break before first BRV attack
 • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%

While Last Hunter active:
 • BRV Attack becomes following Fearsiphon:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Higher turn rate when attacking target afflicted with Break
 • Even higher turn rate, next turn does not consume ability use count when inflicting Break (some abilities excluded)
 • HP Attack becomes following Scourge:
 • 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • When attacking target afflicted with Break:
 • Scourge becomes Scourge+, adds following effects:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

desc.en:
Increases party's BREAK Bonus by 100%

When using [Big Bang]
• If target is broken, cancel's BREAK and inflicts BREAK
• BRV attack hit count becomes 10
　Increases total BRV potency by 180%
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 30%
desc.gl:
Tremendously increases party's Break Bonus

When using Big Bang:
 • Cancels Break on all enemies afflicted with Break, inflicts Break before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 10; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
desc.jp:
味方全員に入るブレイクボーナスを極大アップ

「ビッグバン」使用時
・BRV攻撃前に対象がブレイク中の場合はブレイクを解除した上でブレイク
・8HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　5HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ

「光の狩人」の与えるHPダメージ小アップ条件が
自身がブレイク中の敵を攻撃時に変化
「光の狩人」の攻撃力アップの効果小アップ
「光の狩人」に以下の効果が追加
・自身の与えるHPダメージ小アップ
・自身がブレイク中の敵を攻撃時
　自身の与えるBRVダメージ小アップ
